content:
IHDInsightJobManagementClient Interface

Definition

The HDInsight job client manages jobs against HDInsight clusters.

In this Article

public interface IHDInsightJobManagementClient : IDisposable

Properties

ClusterDnsName

The cluster dns name against which the job management is to be performed.
Credentials

Basic authentication credentials for job submission.
JobManagement

Operations for managing jobs against HDInsight clusters.
SdkUserAgent

Gets or sets the SDK UserAgent text to be added to the user agent header. This is used to further differentiate various SDK versions.
UserAgentSuffix

Gets or sets the additional UserAgent text to be added to the user agent header. This is used to further differentiate using applications.
UserName

The user name from Username of BasicAuthenticationCloudCredentials in lower case used for running job.
